title: The Naked Scientists - A Launch Pad For the Physical Sciences
abstractText: Working with STFC-supported scientists nationally, this 3 year project will build upon and consolidate an existing Cambridge University public engagement initiative, called the Naked Scientists, to carry STFC-relevant research, via radio and online channels, to over one million people per week, UK wide. This includes young people aged 11-16 who will be additionally targeted through specific interactions with their schools.
